title: Business Process Web Viewer
members: Pascal Gerber, Dominik Regli, Peter Stöckli, Flavio Sadeghi
description: Watch and control the flow of your IoT process with a Web based BPM Viewer. Our aim is to connect ivy with simple IoT devices like light bulbs and sensors via an event bus and adjust the process via the Web. The project is broken up in different parts and phases, some parts are prepared.

featureset.title: Business Process Web Viewer
featureset.description:
Phase 1: Display an ivy process on the web with a previously existing Web BPM Viewer (Research Project).
Phase 2: Modify and/or interact with the configuration of process elements.

featureset.title: Event Bus
featureset.description:
Phase 1: Add an event bus to ivy and provide a REST API to interact with the event bus.
Phase 2: Provide a WebSocket API to listen to the event bus.

featureset.title: Signal Process Elements
featureset.description:
Phase 1: Use existing process elements to send an receive events.
Phase 2: Create simple Signal elements (sender and receiver)

featureset.title: Internet Of Things (IoT)
featureset.description:
Phase 1:
- Communicate with previously prepared IoT Kit for Home automation
- Turn on lights
- Listen to sensor events

featureset.title: DOWNLOAD
featureset.description: Download this spike and test it with a own project.

features.title: Process Viewer
features.text1: Show an Axon.ivy process in a web browser.

features.title: Process Navigation
features.text1: Navigate in/out of a Sub Process.

features.title: Process Control
features.text1: Control the process in the browser.

features.title: Web Socket
features.text1: Receive events from the Engine via Web Socket.

features.title: Event Start / Listener
features.text1: Create a business process based on fired events.
